item.title: Quince
item.description: We went to Quince. It was awesome. This isn’t a review, I’m not qualified for that. If you can go, you should go. Take more pictures than I did. Menu and Pairings English Peas Sicilian Pistachio, Horseradish Wine: F.X. Pichler, Grüner Veltliner, Federspiel, “Loibenberg Frauenweigarten”, Wachau, Austria 2015 Tsar Nicoulai Caviar Avocado, Ruby Beet, Sorrel Wine: Krug, “Grand Cuvée 166 Ème Édition,” Champagne, France, MV Squid Zucchini, Pine Nut, Saffron
